Define Documentation

#define GetDigest ( obj,
ctx   ) 
Value:
do { \
    Data_Get_Struct((obj), EVP_MD_CTX, (ctx)); \
    if (!(ctx)) { \
        ossl_raise(rb_eRuntimeError, "Digest CTX wasn't initialized!"); \
    } \
} while (0)

#define SafeGetDigest ( obj,
ctx   ) 
Value:

    OSSL_Check_Kind((obj), cDigest); \
    GetDigest((obj), (ctx)); \
} while (0)
